data.headline: Cisco-led tech weakness weighed on the Nasdaq, driving sector underperformance
bullets: Dow hovered near record highs as traders rotated into cyclicals, small caps, utilities, and materials
S&P 500 and Russell 2000 slipped amid stock-specific earnings volatility
Jobless claims remained resilient, but existing home sales data disappointed
Softer dollar and higher oil prices reflected U.S.â€“Iran tensions and influenced market sentiment
Strong demand for corporate debt signaled ongoing risk appetite
Traders focused on upcoming CPI data and key earnings from Airbnb, Applied Materials, and Coinbase after a muted PPI report
